quote.author: Thomas A. Edison
quote.body: Restlessness is discontent and discontent is the first necessity of progress. Show me a thoroughly satisfied man and I will show you a failure.

quote.author: Henry Ford
quote.body: The only real security that a man can have in this world is a reserve of knowledge, experience and ability.

quote.author: Richard Dawkins
quote.body: When I say that human beings are just gene machines, one shouldn't put too much emphasis on the word 'just.' There is a very great deal of complication, and indeed beauty in being a gene machine.

quote.author: Napoleon Hill
quote.body: Cherish your visions and your dreams as they are the children of your soul, the blueprints of your ultimate achievements.

quote.author: Voltaire
quote.body: What most persons consider as virtue, after the age of 40 is simply a loss of energy.
